body_html: nvcc decides what GPU architectures to compile for based on the GPUs on your system, so if there are two different generations, it will compile for both. You can set the architectures you want with TORCH_CUDA_ARCH_LIST. This is a general CUDA thing and it's fairly uncommon to have mixed GPUs in one box, so I'm not sure it makes sense to add this to the README. Maybe we could try to detect if this situation occurred and give a better error message, but this probably won't happen unless someone submits a patch.
